@marcorubio Senator - Im in the icu in Tallahassee caring for our people. THERE IS NO GOOD NEWS. This is a disaster, perpetrated by your leader Trump & all of you who support/supported him. 

You Rs are as guilty as were Soviet leaders after Chernobyl. #TrumpFailure #COVID19
